DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine 1. prevalence lumbar facet joint pain detect manual segmental provocation test 2. prevalence MRI finding lumbar facet joint ( hypertrophy , effusion , edema ) 3. association lumbar facet joint pain MRI finding segmental level subject current low back pain control group .
DOC.brief_title: Association Between Clinical Signs MRI Findings Lumbar Facet Joints
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria study group : age > 18 write informed consent ability perform require examination Inclusion Criterion current low back paingroup : ( > = ) 30 day low back pain last three month Inclusion Criterion control group : le 30 day low back pain last three month Exclusion Criteria study group : acute radicular low back pain last three month claustrophobia spondylodesis lumbar spine metallic implant MRIcompatible
